briefTitle: Phase IIIb Study of APD421 in Combination as PONV Prophylaxis
officialTitle: Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase III Study of APD421 (Amisulpride for IV Injection) as Combination Prophylaxis Against Post-operative Nausea and Vomiting in High-risk Patients
summary: A comparison of the efficacy of APD421 and placebo when combined with a standard anti-emetic in the prevention of PONV in patients at high risk of Post-operative Nausea and Vomiting (PONV).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Complete Response
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 24 hours after the end of surgery
